job_purpose: To learn and contribute to both frontend and backend development for the organization's platform using best practices, collaborate with the team to implement new features, gain exposure to DevOps and AWS, and work in an agile team environment.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Learn and build frontend and backend development for the platform
Collaborate with Product Owner and developer to implement new features
Gain hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and AWS ecosystem
Participate in sprint standups, pair programming, and issue resolution
required_qualifications: Solid fundamentals in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Strong skills in one Object-Oriented Programming language
Experience with Git and REST APIs
Eagerness to tackle new challenges and contribute in a fast-paced team environment
preferred_qualifications: Exposure to Vue.js or other JavaScript frameworks
Experience with Java Spring Boot, Cloud, or open-source contributions
company_details: Elan2 is a SaaS startup company offering an organization management platform to optimize workflows and daily tasks. The company values mentorship, a supportive culture, flexibility, and professional development for its employees.
